title: Introduction
brief: Learn how React works. The way React handles UI. React is very promising since it's also used in Web 3.0. Easy to make UI without manipulating DOM directly.

title: Virtual DOM
brief: Virtual DOM is a very fundamental concept of React. Get a good grasp of Virtual DOM is very necessary to unserstand react's work flow

title: JSX Element and Rendering Element
brief: JavaScript XML, JSX provides an easy solution for creating React components and elements. It involves writing HTML like markup, but, Developer has much control over JSX

title: Component & Props
brief: Components are functional or representational unit of a React frontend application. Props are the way of communication between Parent-Child component

title: State & Lifecyle
brief: State refers to the variables that can be changed based on user interactions. React reacts to this state change and updates UI

title: Handling Events
brief: Since, React uses Virtual DOM, it's a bit tricky to handle events in terms of React. Event handlers should be implemented properly, otherwise, the app may crash.
